trans-unit.source: Sets the identity of the user for an ASP.NET application when Windows authentication is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 启用 Windows 身份验证后，请设置为 ASP.NET 应用程序的用户的标识。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: When the authentication <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode>, the WindowsAuthenticationModule sets the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to an <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object that represents the Windows identity supplied by IIS for the current request.
trans-unit.target: 当身份验证<xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>设置为<xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode>，WindowsAuthenticationModule 集<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>属性的当前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>到<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>表示为当前请求的 IIS 提供的 Windows 标识的对象。</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If IIS uses anonymous authentication, then the WindowsAuthenticationModule uses the identity returned by the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果 IIS 使用匿名身份验证，则 WindowsAuthenticationModule 使用返回的标识<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A>方法。</xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A>

trans-unit.source: The WindowsAuthenticationModule exposes an <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event that enables you to provide a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object for the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: WindowsAuthenticationModule 公开<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>，使您可以提供自定义<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal><xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>属性的当前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext></xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>对象</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>的事件</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event is accessed by specifying a subroutine named **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>事件可通过指定一个名为子例程**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** ASP.NET 应用程序的 Global.asax 文件中。</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In IIS 7.0, using the WindowsAuthenticationModule class with the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> class is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 在 IIS 7.0 中，使用与 WindowsAuthenticationModule 类<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>不支持类。</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: For more information about compatibility issues in Integrated mode, see [Moving an ASP.NET Application from IIS 6.0 to IIS 7.0](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关在集成模式下的兼容性问题的详细信息，请参阅[从 IIS 6.0 的 ASP.NET 应用程序迁移到 IIS 7.0](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 创建的实例<xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is not intended to be called from application code.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数不应从应用程序代码中调用。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET calls this constructor to create an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> class.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 调用此构造函数来创建实例的<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>类。</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: After calling the constructor, it calls the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Init%2A> method to initialize the new <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> object.
trans-unit.target: 后调用的构造函数，它调用<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Init%2A>方法以初始化新<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>对象。</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Init%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the application authenticates the current request.
trans-unit.target: 当应用程序进行身份验证当前的请求时发生。

trans-unit.source: The Authenticate event is raised during the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> event.
trans-unit.target: 身份验证事件期间引发<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>事件。</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>

trans-unit.source: You can access the Authenticate event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> class by specifying a subroutine named **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 你可以访问的身份验证事件<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>类通过指定一个名为子例程**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** ASP.NET 应用程序的 Global.asax 文件中。</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> object supplied to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs>对象提供给**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件设置<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>属性的当前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>向自定义<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>对象。</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property during the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the Windows identity supplied by IIS is used as the identity for the current request.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定的值<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>期间属性**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件，Windows IIS 提供的标识用作当前请求的标识。</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: If IIS uses anonymous authentication, then the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A> property is set to the identity returned by the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果 IIS 使用匿名身份验证，则<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A>属性设置为返回的标识<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A>方法。</xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A>

trans-unit.source: The **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is raised only when the authentication <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> and the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> is an active HTTP module for the application.
trans-unit.target: **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**引发事件时，才身份验证<xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>设置为<xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode>和<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>是应用程序的活动 HTTP 模块。</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In IIS 7.0 running in Integrated Mode, the Authenticate event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> is not raised when both the ASP.NET <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> and the IIS `AnonymousAuthenticationModule` modules are enabled.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 中运行的 IIS 7.0 中集成模式下，身份验证事件的<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>则不会引发时这两个 ASP.NET<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>和 IIS`AnonymousAuthenticationModule`模块均已启用。</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, to receive authentication notification, subscribe to the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> event of the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication> instance.
trans-unit.target: 在此方案中，若要接收身份验证通知，订阅<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>事件<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication>实例。</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>

trans-unit.source: For more information about compatibility issues in Integrated modes, see [Moving an ASP.NET Application from IIS 6.0 to IIS 7.0](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关在集成模式下的兼容性问题的详细信息，请参阅[从 IIS 6.0 的 ASP.NET 应用程序迁移到 IIS 7.0](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources, other than memory, used by the <xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 释放所有资源，以外使用的内存<xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended to be called from application code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不应从应用程序代码中调用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化<xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended to be called from application code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不应从应用程序代码中调用。

trans-unit.source: The Init method ensures that the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> is included in the processing of the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> event.
trans-unit.target: Init 方法可确保<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>包含在处理<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>事件。</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 当前<xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication"></xref>实例。
